title: Real-time AI bot detection accuracy
description: Verify that the system detects and classifies AI bots visiting the website with accuracy above 95%, and confidence scores are correctly assigned.

steps.description: Simulate visits from known AI bot platforms and normal users on the website using the tracking API.
Verify the AI bot detection algorithm classifies visits correctly with accuracy > 95%.
Verify confidence scores are generated and fall within expected ranges.

title: Real-time Dashboard live updates latency
description: Ensure the live AI bot activity feed updates within 2 seconds of data arrival for real-time monitoring.

steps.description: Generate AI bot activity events and post them through the tracking API.
Observe the real-time dashboard's live feed for update propagation.
Confirm that live feed updates within 2 seconds of event generation.

title: API response times under normal load
description: Test that all analytics and tracking API endpoints respond within 200ms under typical load conditions.

steps.description: Send multiple concurrent valid requests to tracking and analytics API endpoints.
Measure and verify all API response times are less than 200ms.

title: Dashboard chart data accuracy
description: Verify that all visual charts (Brand Visibility, Share of Voice, Visits, Top Bots, Hourly Trends) correctly reflect the aggregated AI bot visit data.

steps.description: Seed database with known AI bot visit data with controlled timestamps and platform identifiers.
Access the analytics dashboard and navigate through each chart tab.
Confirm each chart accurately represents the seeded data values and trends.

title: Content Optimization recommendations validity
description: Validate that AI-powered content optimization suggestions are generated based on up-to-date data trends and user feedback.

steps.description: Input current trend data and simulate user feedback into the content optimization module.
Ensure generated optimization recommendations are relevant, actionable, and consistent with input data.

title: Tracking script and pixel data collection
description: Verify that the JS tracking script and pixel correctly collect visit data and synchronize it with the Supabase backend.

steps.description: Integrate the provided JS tracking script and pixel into a test website.
Simulate AI bot and user visits to the test website.
Verify that visits are recorded correctly within the Supabase database in real-time.

title: User Interface responsiveness and consistency
description: Verify UI components render correctly and consistently across supported browsers and device sizes, including responsiveness of the Glass Morphism theme.

steps.description: Open the platform on multiple browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) and various devices (desktop, tablet, mobile).
Check UI element alignment, readability, and responsiveness to window resizing.
Confirm Glass Morphism styling is consistently applied across components.

title: Security and roles-based access control enforcement
description: Check that user data privacy is maintained and that access controls based on subscription tiers and user roles are enforced correctly.

steps.description: Attempt to access restricted APIs and UI components with users assigned different roles and subscription tiers.
Verify unauthorized access is denied and proper error messages or redirects are presented.
Confirm users can only access features allowed by their subscription limits.

title: Subscription tier limits enforcement
description: Ensure the system correctly limits visits, data retention, and API access based on the user's subscription tier.

steps.description: Simulate user subscription tiers with varying limits on visits and API throughput.
Generate traffic exceeding those limits or access features beyond tier permissions.
Confirm the system enforces limits with appropriate warnings or errors.

title: Customizable time range filter functionality
description: Verify that the time range filter allows users to select different date ranges and that analytics data refreshes accordingly.

steps.description: Select various predefined and custom date ranges in the time range filter component.
Confirm all charts and metrics update to reflect data strictly within the selected ranges.

title: Competitive Intelligence benchmarking accuracy
description: Validate that competitor share-of-voice charts and SWOT benchmarking display accurate analytics based on current data.

steps.description: Seed competitor and brand data into the system.
Open Competitive Intelligence tab and review share-of-voice and SWOT charts.
Confirm displayed data matches seeded input and calculations are correct.

title: Query Discovery trending topics identification
description: Check that the Query Discovery feature accurately identifies trending topics and content gaps based on AI platform data.

steps.description: Inject sample query data with temporal and platform metadata representing trending topics.
Verify Query Discovery tab lists trending topics and accurately highlights content gaps.

title: Real-Time Monitoring alerts and live feed
description: Ensure that live AI bot activity alerts are triggered promptly and the real-time feed updates with new events.

steps.description: Simulate bot activity events with alert conditions (e.g. spike in visits).
Verify alert notifications appear in the real-time monitoring interface immediately.
Confirm the live feed updates dynamically with the incoming events.

title: Comprehensive logging and error handling validation
description: Verify system logs important events and errors, providing useful information for troubleshooting and monitoring.

steps.description: Trigger known errors or edge cases in API requests and UI interactions.
Check system logs record detailed error information appropriately.
Confirm error messages are informative and user-friendly.

title: Scalability under high load
description: Test platform backend scalability by simulating high volumes of AI bot visits and analytics queries concurrently.

steps.description: Use load testing tools to generate simultaneous high-volume tracking API requests.
Run concurrent queries on analytics endpoints during load.
Verify system stability, response times within SLA, and no data loss or corruption.
